headline: A Look At Arista Networks (ANET) Valuation After Analyst Upgrades On AI And Hyperscaler Exposure
summary: Arista Networks (ANET) is back in focus after a cluster of analyst upgrades highlighting its growing exposure to AI workloads and hyperscaler customers, just weeks before its next earnings release. See our latest analysis for Arista Networks. Despite the recent analyst attention and a share price of US$129.83, Arista’s momentum has cooled in the short term, with a 90 day share price return of an 11.43% decline. Its 1 year total shareholder return of 6.86% and very large 5 year total...
